title: Google\Cloud\Run\V2\Task
name: Task
description:
Task represents a single run of a container to completion.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.run.v2.Task

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Constructor.

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Output only. The unique name of this Task.

params.name: data.uid
params.description: Output only. Server assigned unique identifier for the Task. The value is a UUID4 string and guaranteed to remain unchanged until the resource is deleted.

params.name: data.generation
params.description: Output only. A number that monotonically increases every time the user modifies the desired state.

params.name: data.labels
params.description: KRM-style labels for the resource. User-provided labels are shared with Google's billing system, so they can be used to filter, or break down billing charges by team, component, environment, state, etc. For more information, visit https://cloud.google.com/resource-manager/docs/creating-managing-labels or https://cloud.google.com/run/docs/configuring/labels Cloud Run will populate some labels with 'run.googleapis.com' or 'serving.knative.dev' namespaces. Those labels are read-only, and user changes will not be preserved.

params.name: data.annotations
params.description: KRM-style annotations for the resource.

params.name: data.create_time
params.description: Output only. Represents time when the task was created by the job controller. It is not guaranteed to be set in happens-before order across separate operations.

params.name: data.start_time
params.description: Output only. Represents time when the task started to run. It is not guaranteed to be set in happens-before order across separate operations.

params.name: data.completion_time
params.description: Output only. Represents time when the Task was completed. It is not guaranteed to be set in happens-before order across separate operations.

params.name: data.update_time
params.description: Output only. The last-modified time.

params.name: data.delete_time
params.description: Output only. For a deleted resource, the deletion time. It is only populated as a response to a Delete request.

params.name: data.expire_time
params.description: Output only. For a deleted resource, the time after which it will be permamently deleted. It is only populated as a response to a Delete request.

params.name: data.job
params.description: Output only. The name of the parent Job.

params.name: data.execution
params.description: Output only. The name of the parent Execution.

params.name: data.containers
params.description: Holds the single container that defines the unit of execution for this task.

params.name: data.volumes
params.description: A list of Volumes to make available to containers.

params.name: data.max_retries
params.description: Number of retries allowed per Task, before marking this Task failed.

params.name: data.timeout
params.description: Max allowed time duration the Task may be active before the system will actively try to mark it failed and kill associated containers. This applies per attempt of a task, meaning each retry can run for the full timeout.

params.name: data.service_account
params.description: Email address of the IAM service account associated with the Task of a Job. The service account represents the identity of the running task, and determines what permissions the task has. If not provided, the task will use the project's default service account.

params.name: data.execution_environment
params.description: The execution environment being used to host this Task.

params.name: data.reconciling
params.description: Output only. Indicates whether the resource's reconciliation is still in progress. See comments in Job.reconciling for additional information on reconciliation process in Cloud Run.

params.name: data.conditions
params.description: Output only. The Condition of this Task, containing its readiness status, and detailed error information in case it did not reach the desired state.

params.name: data.observed_generation
params.description: Output only. The generation of this Task. See comments in Job.reconciling for additional information on reconciliation process in Cloud Run.

params.name: data.index
params.description: Output only. Index of the Task, unique per execution, and beginning at 0.

params.name: data.retried
params.description: Output only. The number of times this Task was retried. Tasks are retried when they fail up to the maxRetries limit.

params.name: data.last_attempt_result
params.description: Output only. Result of the last attempt of this Task.

params.name: data.encryption_key
params.description: Output only. A reference to a customer managed encryption key (CMEK) to use to encrypt this container image. For more information, go to https://cloud.google.com/run/docs/securing/using-cmek

params.name: data.vpc_access
params.description: Output only. VPC Access configuration to use for this Task. For more information, visit https://cloud.google.com/run/docs/configuring/connecting-vpc.

params.name: data.etag
params.description: Output only. A system-generated fingerprint for this version of the resource. May be used to detect modification conflict during updates.
